entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebApplication.CreateSlimBuilder() should auto-register AuthN/Z middleware when associated services are added #47507
    8.0-preview4
  • Render Notification #47505
  • Cookie session ID cannot be regenerated when using a custom ticket store #47503
  • In Blazor's EditContext class, why is there no MarkAsModified method? #47497
  • [Signalr-Cpp-Client] Having trouble referencing and using the lib when cross-compiling for target linux-arm (RPi4) #47495
  • QuickGrid in NET 8 - column resizing #47494
  • Add IHttpMetricsTagsFeature and IConnectionMetricsTagsFeature #47493
  • Add IRouteDiagnosticsMetadata #47492

Closed

  • cant get windows authentication credentials via defaultcredentials #47143
    Discussions
  • Add option to refresh the claims of a logged in user from UserInfo endpoint #47125
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis` not working with IPv6 because using an old version of `StackExchange.Redis` #45424
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Fix inconsistent cache behavior for empty buffers #38796
    8.0-preview4
  • Improve documentation for blazor authentication #47490
  • [Proposal] Leverage Sqlite for Desktop https developer-certificates. #47042
  • [Blazor] DotnetStreams bug #47473
    Backlog
  • Allow replacing the Blazor NavigationManager using an interface #46193
    Discussions
  • Blazor - JavaScript interop returns the wrong values for some types in production builds #47468
  • Adding custom events does not work as expected in Blazor, in .NET 7 and 8 #47363

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace SpanHelper.ReplacePlusWithSpace #47506
    needs-area-label
  • [DO NOT REVIEW] Throw if an https URL is added to the address collection #47501
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • Treat 'Content-Range's with last-byte-pos equal to length as invalid #47489
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Flow FullAssemblySigningSupported for source-build to repo tasks #47421
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • [cache] fix #38796 - fix inconsistent handling of empty byte[] #47491
    area-runtime, feature-caching, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add MapIdentity<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • Add metrics to hosting and Kestrel #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime
  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Initial streaming SSR mechanisms #47484
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-united, 8.0-preview3
  • [release/7.0] Fix sending to another client from OnConnectedAsync #47204
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
